effect.name: ZoomBox (for objects/layers/frame)
effect.description:
Displays a window containing a zoomed portion of the background.
Last Updated: 2022-09-12 00:07
effect.author: Sketchy/MuddyMole, Edit and DX11 Port by NaitorStudios

parameter.name: sourceX
parameter.description: The x position of the source box

parameter.name: sourceY
parameter.description: The y position of the source box

parameter.name: sourceWidth
parameter.description: The width of the source box

parameter.name: sourceHeight
parameter.description: The height of the source box

parameter.name: windowX
parameter.description: The x position of the window

parameter.name: windowY
parameter.description: The y position of the window
